title: Welcome!
text:
Hi there! I’m Trung Dam, a rising senior pursuing a double major in Data Science and Environmental Studies with a concentration in Statistics at Macalester College (Class of ’25). As an aspiring analyst and researcher, I am dedicated to leveraging data-driven approaches to address environmental challenges and promote sustainable practices within businesses.
Additionally, my passion for alternative energy drives my commitment to contributing to a systematic shift towards clean energy solutions. This prompt me to continuously absorb and distill modern technology and knowledge regarding renewable energy initiatives.
Explore my portfolio where I documented my critical thinking process of various interesting problems, ranging from epidemiology to NCAA March Madness!

Aiden Appel, Trung Dam, Ethan Hyslop, Andie Walker, and Jojo Zhang

title: COVID In Schools
text: Adopting a holistic approach to COVID-19 outbreaks in U.S. Universities and Colleges, our group examined the epidemiology through school size, COVID-19 rate in respective counties, and schools’ political leanings. This interdisciplinary approach provides an overview of COVID-19 epidemiology among national campuses, suggesting interconnected interventions from multiple levels: county, university administration, and students.
